That's one of the clones from the Republic before the Empire was a thing m8.  Better than any Stormtrooper ever was.
Actually the clones become the storm troopers,
I thought the storm troopers were average Joes the empire recruited after the clones mostly died out?
nope they get constant resupply of clones, it is why in the first movie princess leia says to luke in a stormtrooper uniform "Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper."

This is information i acquired form http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Stormtrooper

("By the time the Galactic Civil War began in earnest, Jango Fett's clones were heavily supplanted by clones based on a variety of templates around 9 BBY,[13] followed shortly after by enlisted Humans.")

 ("By 0 BBY, roughly one-third of the stormtroopers were clones based on the Fett template, while recruits steadily became the majority within the Stormtrooper Corps")
shrug, my knowledge of starwars isnt very great outside of the movies... guess i was off, there were still clones though.
Basically, if you see competent Stormtroopers, those are the clones.
There's still a lot of clones in the Storm Troopers. They're a minority now, but they're there.

Thats not a Stormtrooper :P

I know i'm a nerd. Most people find that sexy in a girl :P
Idunno saying it's not a storm trooper is kind of vague for a nerd.
She's not wrong though, in either case.
Well yeah, but that's like calling me a fanboy because I looked at a Wookie and said it wasn't an Ewok.

Sometimes I wonder what the point of these Star Wars series are, literally the story will almost certainly be "In a war, or pre war, or recovering from one, evil person plans destruction of some entity or planet, person with light sabers and the force has to kill the other guy, insert drama here." 


Also, nerf common soldiers, they dominate top lane and picking robots is now suicide.
Star **Wars**
I'm going to be that guy... I have only watched 30 minutes of Star wars and it was the most boring 30 minutes of my Life.
cool story if you don't like it don't click on star wars shit.

really? you're going to try that obvious lie? you clicked on a video with what i believe is a storm trooper/clone and you didn't know it was star wars?
That looked like every action cartoon ever.. Star wars for me = darth vader
nice lie kid. almost as good as you not knowing this star wars post was star wars.
I Think you've seen cartoon network action cartoons. This could be one of them, which it is.
Oh.

How it feels to play trundle in this meta : http://www.gifbin.com/bin/102014/1414429357_camel_bites_man.webm
Trundle is the camel

With the help of movement speed runes, utility masteries such as Swiftness, Wanderer and Explorer, Swiftness boots, Deadsman Plate and Frozen Mallet, I just played a very fun Trundle game! I was tanky and sticky a lot!

I rush bork then get ravenous hydra ( I split) followed by deadmans . w, e behind them oh gawd OH GAWD NOOOO "An 
Enemy has been slain". The q and hydra both reset autos for 4 rapid autos omg its great.

I've been playing around with "melee carries" lately lol
I rush ravenous,  into phantom dancers,  then deaths dance/ Mercurial schimitar. 

I Split as well. He's a real monster, takes at least two just to stop the guy from eating all your towers...

Split push Trundle can eat tower like you say and the best thing is to split push with your TP up and land a nice E for your team when you TP in a team fight, not only that but they will also have to bring minimum 2 people to deal with you on the tower
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
That's obviously not a stormtrooper, he didn't miss a single shot!

Pretty sure the painting on the armor he has says that. I think he's higher ranking than the others?

I can't remember much since I haven't really seen the animated cartoon of star wars, all I know is that guy isn't a stormtrooper as stormtroopers sport white armor.
That's a Clone Trooper owo
basically clone trooper = good guys, stormtrooper = bad guys. They started out as good guys and then were used for ebil.

This is how the ADC should feel like in the first place. Last season it was Sivir with the team movespeed buff who almost never was fed enough to carry, or it was Jinx with her AoE crits that literally outclassed everyone else in damage, with the occasional Kennen pick so you could stun the team. ADC was boring last season, and now it's fun. Give time for the nerfs and it will still be fun, and not broken.

The problem comes in that pretty much _ONLY_ ADC is fun right now, excluding those that exploit crit items and aren't ranged ADCS (read: Trynd and Yasuo)

Oh well, I wasn't planning on playing this preseason anyway.

I'm all for the ADC feeling this way.
Just not at the 5-10 minute mark.
I play Lucian. Honestly, Lucian feels just how you explained, but last season was unplayable, because nearly everything outclassed him.

Trying to make it more fun and have different ways of playing it, I get it. But the problem is that now, it is so unbalanced, and nerfs wont be able to change that without changing how the champions are made, the new passives and stuff. Graves is either gonna be bursty and strong,  or with is low range he's gonna die like a bitchh without doing anything. I have trouble seeing nerfs that are not gonna just shift the unbalanceness of the game around. 
But my biggest pb is that champs that didnt get those reworks Jinx, Ashe, Kalista especially feel outclassed.

>But my biggest pb is that champs that didnt get those reworks Jinx, Ashe, Kalista especially feel outclassed.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:110}}{{item:3070}}  Jinx stole my passive.
Adc Kennen was not at all an occasion pick.
Yet it was picked by Fnatic and they won with it, because it was better than most of the other ADC's.
yea being played only at worlds by just Fnatic doesn't make it occasional pick
